title: Jacket
description: newer; front opening bronze color with purple and red tape applique on collar; bands of commercial embroidery on sleeves and shoulders in blue, red, orange; back is covered with woven fabric of diamond pattern inset with ribbons and bronze borders; purple lining and cuffs
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
